title: The Causes and the effect of multiple personality disorder in Ashiley Patterson's character in Sidney Sheldon's Tell Me Your Dreams
abstract: This is a study about the causes and the effect of Multiple Personality Disorder in Ashley Patterson?s character in Sidney Sheldon?s Tell Me Your Dreams. In this study the writer is curious to know what the causes and the effect of Ashley Patterson?s Multiple Personality Disorder are. Ashley Patterson?s past experiences, caused Ashley suffers from her psychological condition. The writer uses Psychological approach to analyze the main character?s problems. Moreover, the writer uses a several theories that still connect to psychological approach. Those theories consist of Multiple Personality Disorder, Childhood Abuse, Defense Mechanism and Displacement. Finally, the writer reveals that Ashley Patterson?s problems is happen because of her past traumatic experience by her parents. This conditions drives her become a multiple personality disorder person, who is have the other personality inside her body. All of this condition caused Ashley to experiences some bad effect for her future.
contributors: Theophilus Jokri (Advisor 1); Liem Satya Limanta (Examination Committee 1)
source: Undergraduate Thesis No. 01011720/ING/2007; Friska Prawita Wardhany (11402086)
subjects: AMERICAN FICTION-20TH CENTURY-STUDY AND TEACHING; SHELDON, SIDNEY, 1917-... TELL ME YOUR DREAMS-STUDY AND TEACHING
